name: imagor-studio
tagline: A visual tool for composing and testing image transformation pipelines
description: Imagor Studio is a web interface for Imagor, an image processing server. It lets users compose and test transformations like resize, crop and filters visually, then generate the corresponding URLs for automated use.

features.title: Image Processing Interface
features.description: Provides a browser-based interface for generating and testing image transformation requests

features.title: Imagor Service Integration
features.description: Connects to an Imagor backend to apply image processing operations

features.title: Resize and Crop
features.description: Allows users to adjust image dimensions and framing parameters

features.title: Format Conversion
features.description: Converts images into supported output formats

features.title: Transformation Preview
features.description: Displays preview results for image transformation settings

features.title: URL Generation
features.description: Generates image URLs with transformation parameters applied

features.title: Web-Based Access
features.description: Operates entirely through a browser without local tooling

features.title: Self-Hosted Image Tool
features.description: Can be hosted on your own infrastructure alongside Imagor
